#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	while(1){
		unsigned int a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		if(a==0&&b==0) break;
		int count=0,carry=0;
		while(a>0&&b>0){
			int digit1=a%10,digit2=b%10;
			if(digit1+digit2+carry>9){
				carry=(digit1+digit2+carry)/10;
				count++;
			}
			a/=10; b/=10;
		}
		if(count==0) cout<<"No carry operation.\n";
		else if(count==1) cout<<"1 carry operation.\n";
		else cout<<count<<" carry operations.\n";
	}
    return 0;
}
